resources.string:
Super Genki aims to be a general purpose app for Japanese language learners. We encourage users and developers of the like to help contribute to the app in any way they can. If you found a bug or want to make a contribution, you can checkout the source code at our Github page.

The Team

Super Genki is developed by funayman and Xsixteen.

Licence

Super Genki is open-source under the Apache Licence 2.0. You can read more about the licence here

FOSS Materials

The Super Genki app could not have been created without the following open-source libraries and applications:

JMDict
